name: News Media Europe
goal: News Media Europe represents and promoting the interests of the European news media industry. The association represents over 2200 news brands, in print and online, on radio or television.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Media Freedom, Copyright, Taxation, Data & Advertising, Competition & Sustainability, News Print
